title: Philadelphia (1993)Tom Hanks + Denzel Washington(Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107818/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107818/</a>

With Antonio Banderas

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files: (Work in Windows Media Player etc.): Danish, Dutch (srt format), English, Finnish, German, Icelandic, Norwegian, Swedish.

Tom Hanks got his well-earned first Oscar for this great classic, and Bruce Springsteen for best music (Original song: Streets of Philadelphia). I could find no smaller rip with multisubs here, so I made one for you.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x384, great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
